eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
\label{E0rad}
E_{rad}^{(d)} &=& F_{rad}^{(d)}+\beta 
\frac{\partial F_{rad}^{(d)}}{\partial \beta} =
\frac{d a^d}{2\pi}D(0)^2 \Gamma \left(\frac{d+1}{2}\right) 
(4\pi)^{(d+1)/2} \zeta(d+1) (1-2^{-(d+1)}) \beta^{-d-1}\,, \\
\label{P0rad}
P_{rad}^{(d)} &=& -\frac1d\frac{\partial
F_{rad}^{(d)}}{\partial ({\rm ln}\, a)}= 
\frac{E_{rad}^{(d)}}{d} \,,
\
